header.description:
This game was originally created by BOWLG. I have added to this.
°Redesigned the buttons °Added sound effects °Added more zombie animation °Added kill counter °Player HP °Levels (4 total) °Game win Screen °Game Over Screen °Jump over Zombies (with continues button prrss) °Limit on special weapon °Special weapon refill (sphere) I hope you like the remix Also sorry for the spaghetti code. I didn't plan it out so kept adding to one idea after the next.
Don't forget to check out BOWLG original game.
Find me on plus.google.com/+FrankX

formula.value: When zombie reaches the edge reset it's position.
If zombie walks over players position reduce 1 point for every cycle zombie occupies same space as player.
Remixed by FrankX 08/05/2015 find me on Google+
If Special Button is disabled and you have no bombs do nothing.
Disables the Special Button if you are out of bombs
Send special orb in long intervals.
Send orb in more rapid intervals.
If true broadcast killed in action.
Check to see if player WON, If True broadcast WIN
If player didn't win broadcast Next Level.
When zombie reaches the edge reset it's position.
If zombie walks over players position reduce 1 point for every cycle zombie occupies same space as player.
